definitions.definition: To administer (a drug) in bolus dosing, that is, dosing in (one or more) boluses .
To take a bolus ( dose ) of insulin at a mealtime in order to control one's blood glucose level in diabetes .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To administer (a drug) in bolus dosing, that is, dosing in (one or more) boluses .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To take a bolus ( dose ) of insulin at a mealtime in order to control one's blood glucose level in diabetes .
